TopicTitle: Do any mods that have extra cargo bays and service bays in 1.11.x?

Articles.Content:
I've been looking for mods that add longer and more interesting cargo bays and service bays for the normal stock sizes, but I cannot find anything matching my preferences.

Do you guys know of any good part mods that add more service and cargo bays for 1.11.x?

KIS tanks also add storage for the stock inventory system

Universal Storage 2 for cargo bays

also restock + for revamped one an new ones
